data.text:
@MilkFiend17 @Bornforbarn @mandajbr @atypicalalbertn I honestly hope you’re right, but there’s no scientific basis to that line of thought.

It breaks my heart every time I see an unvaccinated person sick with this horrible disease, when there’s a good chance they wouldn’t be there had they made different choices.
@Fish100MD @Bornforbarn @mandajbr @atypicalalbertn No guarantee, but little reason to think it won't be.

@Bornforbarn @Fish100MD @mandajbr @atypicalalbertn So what is a boomer? It used to be an age group. You guys bastardise language though, so I'm just curious what is it that you guys mean when you use that term?

@MilkFiend17 @Bornforbarn @mandajbr @atypicalalbertn Just as long as you also know that one dose of vaccine after recovering from COVID is associated with lower risk of reinfection. No guarantee next variant will be also mild.

Effectiveness of the BNT162b2 Vaccine after Recovery from Covid-19 | NEJM https://t.co/EI8RbCIdFD

@Bornforbarn @Fish100MD @mandajbr @atypicalalbertn No, no no no no no. Twitter isn't "the world"? No, you've shattered my entire belief system. No no no no. 

Touch grass? Come on dude, you sound like my 11 year nephew. Embarrassing.
@Bornforbarn @Fish100MD @mandajbr @atypicalalbertn I guess conversations are just constant "baits" being cast? Is that your view of the world?
@Fish100MD @Bornforbarn @mandajbr @atypicalalbertn Nothing. I'm just glad I didn't get vaccinated. I obviously didn't need it. So I'm glad I didn't get something unnecessarily.
